supplychainpy.bi package¶

Submodules¶

supplychainpy.bi.recommendation_generator module¶

supplychainpy.bi.recommendation_generator.run_profile_recommendation(analysed_orders: supplychainpy.inventory.analyse_uncertain_demand.UncertainDemand, forecast: dict) → dict¶

Runs profile recommendation state machine and generates recommendations for entire inventory profile.

Parameters:
  • analysed_orders (UncertainDemand) – Analysed orders as UncertainDemand object
  • forecast (dict) – Forecast results for same data set.
Returns:

Recommendations for entire inventory profile
Return type:

dict
supplychainpy.bi.recommendation_generator.run_sku_recommendation(analysed_orders: supplychainpy.inventory.analyse_uncertain_demand.UncertainDemand, forecast: dict) → dict¶

Runs SKU recommendation state machine and generates recommendations for each sku.

Parameters:
  • analysed_orders (UncertainDemand) – Analysed Orders.
  • forecast (dict) – forecast.
Returns:

Recommendations for each sku.
Return type:

dict
